sense.gloss: customary "on" reading (of a kanji) used in Japanese (as opposed to those derived from Chinese)
Wu reading (of a kanji; as opposed to a Han reading)

sdata.j: ↑長良川↑↓ながらが|わ↓↑温泉↑↓おん|せん↓の「↑信長↑↓のぶなが↓おもてなし↑御膳↑↓ごぜん↓」は、↑戦国↑↓せんごく↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓のおもてなし↑料理↑↓りょうり↓「↑本膳↑↓ほんぜん↓↑料理↑↓りょうり↓」を↑現代↑↓げんだい↓↑風↑↓ふう↓にアレンジしたものです。
sdata.e: Nagaragawa Onsen’s “Nobunaga Hospitality Meal” is a modern style adaptation of a Sengoku period hospitality meal (Honzen-ryōri).
